short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: modify user-agent info to use old version bilibili

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: By enabling this extension, it will automatically replace user-agent headers of https requests to bilibili.com to older version of Chrome browser. With fake chrome version, you are able to avoid the ugly new UI which definitely NOT designed for Desktop users.
